taskbody.context: To insert a breakpoint, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Click the line where you want to insert the breakpoint in the XML source document or the XSLT/XQuery document.
step.info: You can only set breakpoints on the XML source in XSLT or XQuery debugging sessions.
Breakpoints are automatically created on the ending line of a start tag, even if you click a different line.

step.cmd: Click the vertical stripe on the left side of the editor panel or select Create Breakpoint from the Edit Breakpoints menuRight-click on the vertical stripe on the left side of the editor panel and select Add breakpoint.
